title: Shipping Industry to Drive Demand for Green Ammonia: Avaada Chairman
description: The shipping industry is set to drive demand for green ammonia and methanol, derived from green hydrogen. The EU's Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism is expected to boost offtake agreements. India's National Green Hydrogen Mission aims for global leadership, with Avaada Group committing to significant renewable energy and manufacturing capacity development.
